definition: "speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 言字旁[yan2 zi4 pang2]
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
to comment/to talk about/to discuss/discussion/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Uijeongbu District Court will be held on November 1 to pronounce on the case.
sentences.chinese: 议政府地方法院将于11月1日就这一案件作出宣判。

sentences.english: But he was the most talked-about feature of the conference.
sentences.chinese: 但他是这次大会最受热议的嘉宾。

sentences.english: Meeting name 《the controversy Sung Dynasty Cu Ju and citizen strength strong relation 》 .
sentences.chinese: 会议名称《议宋朝蹴鞠与国力强盛关系》。

sentences.english: A member of the Thai "Red Shirt" movement released a pigeon during a protest Friday in Bangkok.
sentences.chinese: 一名泰国红杉军成员在抗丆议活动中放飞一只鸽子。

sentences.english: The organizer reserves the right of making any amendment on the course and the decision should be final.
sentences.chinese: 主办机构保留修改章程的权利，參加者不得異议。

sentences.english: Day, Uijeongbu District Prosecutor's Office somewhere in the K to 15 years imprisonment.
sentences.chinese: 当天，议政府地方检察厅对K某处以有期徒刑15年。

sentences.english: Funds raised through the crowd to vote for, one thing one debate, and for superior support.
sentences.chinese: 通过群众集资投劳，一事一议，和争取上级支持。

sentences.english: Eda Satsuki, president of House of Councilors of Japan, conveyed condolences to the Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: 日本国会参议院议长江田五月向中国人民表示慰问。

definition: to comment/to talk about/to discuss/discussion/CL:個|个[ge4]
to make a suggestion/to state (one's views, ideas etc)/suggestion/advice/idea
to learn sth through hearsay/to get wind of sth

to draw (e.g. a bow)/to pull/to stretch sth/to extend/to lengthen/to involve or implicate in/to attract/to lead/to guide/to leave/to provide evidence or justification for/old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhang4], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters
all levels of society/the imperial court and the ordinary people
to correct (in writing) sb's errors or misconceptions
